content: Mother Earth represents fertility, motherhood and creation. She is the great sacred womb from which we came and to which we will return after our present existence.
translations: ita:Madre Terra rappresenta la fertilità, la maternità e la creazione. È il grande grembo sacro da cui siamo venuti e al qua
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
